SELECT DISTINCT A.seller_no as no, A.seller_name as name, A.seller_id as id, LISTAGG(D.short_service_name, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY D.service_no) OVER (PARTITION BY A.seller_no) as service, A.seller_tel as tel, A.seller_reg_date as regDate
FROM seller A, seller_info B, seller_support_services C, seller_services D
WHERE A.seller_no = B.seller_no AND B.seller_info_no = C.seller_info_no AND C.service_no = D.service_no AND seller_del_yn = 'N'
AND A.seller_id like '%'||#keyword#||'%'
AND A.seller_name like '%'||#keyword#||'%'
AND A.seller_tel = #keyword#
AND A.seller_reg_date >= #fromDate#
AND A.seller_reg_date < to_date(#toDate#) + 1
AND D.service_name = #service#
AND D.service_name = #service#
AND D.service_name = #service#
AND D.service_name = #service#
ORDER BY A.seller_no desc
